name: Pizza Titan Ultra
description: Pizza! Giant robots! Lasers, destruction, evil cyborgs! Arcade action in a fully customizable mech with a pizzeria in its chest.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4700 CPU @ 2.40GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 720 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 @ 2.6GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Storage: 3 GB available space
